20101227190738.000|20101227190741.000|CC1|SINCE IT BEGAN SERVICE IN 1990, 
20101227190741.000|20101227190744.000|CC1|THE BLUE LINE HAS BEEN LINKED   
20101227190744.000|20101227190745.000|CC1|TO 101 FATALITIES AND 875
